description: This file declares the LocalStore class, which implements the ILocalStore interface for managing local data storage using SQLite. It provides methods for opening a database, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entries, removing entries, and adding entries. It also contains a private helper method to build SQL queries.

classes.name: LocalStore
classes.description: A class implementing the ILocalStore interface, providing methods to interact with a local SQLite database for storing entries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Open or connect to the database located at the given path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Create a new table in the database.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Set a limit on entries for a specific table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieve the count of entries in a table between start and maxCount.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieve a list of entries from the table starting from a specific index.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Remove entries from a table between start and end indices.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Add a new entry to the specified table.
